ThingDef.label: barn owl egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized barn owl egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: barn owl egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized barn owl egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a chick. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
